prompt.name: Search for a Health Topic
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User utilizes the search bar to find information on a specific health topic and verifies the search results page.

input.action: 'Click the Search Button', 'Type `Influenza` into the search bar at the top of the page', 'Click the search icon'

expected.outcome: The search results page is displayed, showing all content matching the 'Influenza' keyword.

prompt.name: Navigate to a Specific Disease Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Diseases & Conditions' section via the A-Z index to find information about a specific disease.

input.action: 'Click on the `Health Topics` link in the main navigation menu', 'On the Health Topics Dropdown, click on the `Lyme Disease` link'

expected.outcome: The user successfully reaches the main information page for 'Lyme Disease'.

prompt.name: Find a Data Set
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Data & Statistics' section to find a specific data set.

input.search_input: NCHS - National Center for Health Statistics
input.action: 'Click the Search Button', 'Type `NCHS - National Center for Health Statistics` in the input field', 'Click the search icon'

expected.outcome: The main page for the National Center for Health Statistics (NCHS) is displayed.

prompt.name: Find a Specific Vital Signs Report
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Publications' section, then to the 'Vital Signs' reports, and filters by year and topic to find a specific report.

input.action: 'Click the Search Button', 'Type `HIV` in the input field', 'Click the search icon', 'On the HIV Search page, Click Journals', 'Wait for the page to update', 'Click 7 days in the Filter By Date', 'Wait for the page to update', 'Click on the first report link that appears in the filtered results'

expected.outcome: The user successfully navigates and filters to find a specific Vital Signs report on HIV, confirming the filtering and navigation workflow.

prompt.name: Explore Vaccine Information for a Specific Disease
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for a disease, navigates to its page, finds the 'Vaccines' section, and then locates information for healthcare professionals.

input.action: 'Search for `Mpox` using the main search bar', 'From the search results, click the primary link for `Mpox`', 'On the Mpox page, find and click the `Vaccines` link in the left-hand navigation menu', 'On the vaccination page, scroll down and find a link for `Adult Immunization Schedule Notes | Vaccines & Immunizations` and click it'

expected.outcome: The user successfully finds detailed Mpox vaccine administration information intended for healthcare professionals.

prompt.name: Toggle Language to Spanish
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User changes the site language to Spanish using the language selector.

input.action: 'Click on the `Espa√±ol` link in the top navigation bar'

expected.outcome: The user is redirected to the Spanish version of the CDC website.

prompt.name: Access CDC Newsroom
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens the 'Newsroom' from the CDC homepage.

input.action: 'Scroll to bottom of homepage', 'Click the `Pressroom` link in the footer'

expected.outcome: The user successfully lands on the CDC Newsroom section.

prompt.name: Explore Eggs based Outbreaks
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Eggs section from the homepage.

input.action: 'Click `Outbreaks`', 'Click `Eggs`'

expected.outcome: The Salmonella Outbreak Linked to Eggs page is displayed.

prompt.name: Check Contact CDC Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User visits the contact page to find ways to reach CDC.

input.action: 'Scroll to the bottom of the homepage', 'Click `Contact Us`', 'Click the `Contact CDC` link in the footer'

expected.outcome: The user reaches the CDC contact page with appropriate information.

prompt.name: View Health Topics A-Z Index Results
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens the CDC Health Topics A-Z index page to browse topics alphabetically.

input.action: 'Click `Health Topics`', 'Click `A-Z Index`'

expected.outcome: The Health Topics A-Z index page is loaded successfully.

prompt.name: Access CDC Organization Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds CDC Organizations links via the footer.

input.action: 'Scroll to bottom of homepage', 'Click `Organization` under `About CDC` in the footer'

expected.outcome: CDC's official Organization page is displayed.

prompt.name: Find Traveler's Health Info
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Travel Health section.

input.action: 'Click Health Topics', 'Click on `Travelers Health`'

expected.outcome: Traveler health resources are displayed correctly.

prompt.name: Open Weekly MMWR Reports
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User accesses the MMWR page to view weekly reports.

input.action: 'Type `MMWR` in the search bar', 'Click the search icon', 'Click the `Home page for MMWR`'

expected.outcome: MMWR reports page is loaded.

prompt.name: Browse COVID-19 Updates
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the COVID-19 page from the homepage.

input.action: 'Type `COVID-19` in the search bar', 'Click the search icon', 'Click `Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19)`'

expected.outcome: COVID-19 information hub is displayed.

prompt.name: Access Flu Prevention Info
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for flu prevention and verifies result page.

input.action: 'Click search', 'Type `Flu prevention` in the search bar', 'Press enter', 'Click the top result titled `Flu Burden Prevented by Vaccination 2023-2024 Flu Season`'

expected.outcome: Flu prevention tips and materials are shown.

prompt.name: Open CDC Museum Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to CDC Museum from footer.

input.action: 'Scroll to the bottom of the homepage', 'Click the `CDC Museum` link in the footer'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the official CDC Museum website.

prompt.name: Find Monkeypox Resource Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for Monkeypox and verifies official page.

input.action: 'Click the search icon', 'Type `Monkeypox`', 'Click the top result'

expected.outcome: User is redirected to the updated Mpox resource center.

prompt.name: Access Healthy Schools Info
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to School Health program information.

input.action: 'Scroll down to `A-Z Index`', 'Click letter `S`', 'Input `School Health` in Health topics', 'Click Search'

expected.outcome: The Healthy Schools page is loaded successfully.

prompt.name: Open Injury Prevention Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for 'injury prevention' to read CDC resources.

input.action: 'Click on the search icon', 'Type `Injury prevention` in the search bar', 'Click `Injury and Violence Prevention `'

expected.outcome: Injury and Violence Prevention  and resources are shown.

prompt.name: View Environmental Health Section
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User visits CDC's Environmental Health topic section.

input.action: 'Click `Health Topics`', 'Click `A-Z Index`', 'Click on letter `E`', 'Click on `Environmental Health`'

expected.outcome: Environmental Health program info is visible.

prompt.name: Read About CDC Funding and Grants
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds the Funding and Grants of CDC.

input.action: 'Scroll to footer', 'Click on `Funding and Grants`'

expected.outcome: Funding and Grants of CDC is displayed.

prompt.name: Read About CDC History
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds the historical background of CDC.

input.action: 'Scroll to footer', 'Click on `CDC Museum`', 'In the museum site, click on `CDC History` link in Related Links tab'

expected.outcome: Historical overview of CDC is displayed.

prompt.name: View Publications Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User explores publications from main menu.

input.action: 'Click `Archive` from footer', 'Click `Public Health Publications` in the top menu'

expected.outcome: CDC publication resources are shown.

prompt.name: Open CDC Careers Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User looks for career opportunities at CDC.

input.action: 'Scroll to the footer', 'Click `Careers & Jobs` under About CDC'

expected.outcome: User sees available career info on CDC Careers site.

prompt.name: Track Weekly Influenza Surveillance Reports
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for FluView to access weekly influenza surveillance reports, selects a season, and verifies the report's availability.

input.action: 'Click the search icon', 'Type `FluView`', 'Click the top result that says `FluView`', 'Click `View More` in Past Reports', 'Click 'Weekly US Influenza Surveillance Report: Key Updates for Week 22, ending May 31, 2025''

expected.outcome: User views archived weekly influenza surveillance data for a selected season.

prompt.name: Use CDC's COVID Data Tracker to Analyze Death Trends
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the COVID Data Tracker and drills into death trends by demographic.

input.action: 'Search for `COVID Data Tracker`', 'Click the top result', 'Click `Deaths`', 'Click `Trends` tab', 'Select `The United States`in Geographic Area', 'Select `Weekly Deaths` in View(Left Axis)', 'Select `Weekly %Deaths Due to COVID-19` in View(Right Axis)'

expected.outcome: User successfully explores death trends based on demographic filters and time ranges.

prompt.name: Explore the National Notifiable Diseases Surveillance System (NNDSS)
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds NNDSS, accesses data weekly tables, and filters by year.

input.action: 'Search for `NNDSS`', 'Click `National Notifiable Diseases Surveillance System` result', 'Click `Notifiable Infectious Disease Data Tables` link', 'Click `DATA.CDC.gov Provisional Weekly Infectious Disease Data (2014 to present)`', 'Click `NNDSS Annual Summary Data Query(Available on Wonder)`'

expected.outcome: User views disease data request form using the NNDSS portal.

prompt.name: Navigate to Chronic Disease Data Portal
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.cdc.gov/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds and uses the CDC's Chronic Disease Interactive Atlas to visualize heart disease rates by state.

input.action: 'Search for `Chronic Disease Portal`', 'Click on the link titled `Chronic Disease Indicators (CDI)`', 'Scroll to the `View Maps` tab', 'On the interactive map, select `Cancer` as the indicator', 'Click GO', 'Select indicator `Colon and rectum (colorectal) cancer`', 'Click `View Results`'

expected.outcome: User views Colon and rectum (colorectal) cancer data.
